items.instruction: What is the risk to the business or person?

description.content: Describe the risk to the persons work or business affected by this issue
Is this for ticket or issue for a VIP (Director, CEO, CFO, etc...?)

items.instruction: How many people are affected by this issue?

description.content: Is this affecting 1 person, many or entire organisation?

items.instruction: What is the severity or urgency on this?

description.content: Is this a P1, P2 or P3 based on the previous answers?

items.instruction: How can you reproduce the issue or problem?

description.content: Describe the steps to reproduce the issue/problem

items.instruction: What have you already tried to resolve the issue?
Do you have a workaround you have suggested to the user?
